com.konakart.blif

Interface CurrencyMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyMgr

    public interface CurrencyMgrIf
    CurrencyMgrIf Interface which an implementation of this manager must adhere to.

    • Method Summary

        Currency getDefaultCurrency()
                     throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                            com.konakart.app.KKException,
                            com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException
        Returns the default currency from the cache.
        Returns:
        Returns the default currency object
        Throws:
        com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException - an unexpected exception due to data in Torque (the database layer)
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - an unexpected exception in Torque (the database layer)

      • fetchDefaultCurrency

        Currency fetchDefaultCurrency()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The default currency is referenced by a configuration variable called DEFAULT_CURRENCY. If this isn't found then we return the currency in the currency table with the lowest id. Once found, the default currency is cached.
        Returns:
        Returns a currency
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

        Gets the formatter for the default currency
        Returns:
        Default currency formatter
        Throws:

        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

                  throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException,

        Returns:

      • formatPrice

        java.lang.String formatPrice(java.math.BigDecimal number,
                             java.lang.String currencyCode)
                      throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                             org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                             com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException
        Used to create a string in order to visualise a price. It ensures that the decimal places, the thousands separator and the currency symbol are correct.
        Parameters:
        number - the number
        currencyCode - the currencyCode
        Returns:
        The formatted price
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception
        com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException - an unexpected exception due to data in Torque (the database layer)
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - an unexpected exception in Torque (the database layer)
